Address.value: 1350 OLD BAYSHORE HIGHWAY,SUITE 400, BURLINGAME, California, 94010, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Innoviva Inc develops biopharmaceutical drugs in the antibiotic, respiratory, and digestive realms. Theravance's respiratory compounds are in late-stage trials for asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. Its product offering includes Relvar/Breo/Ellipta, Anoro, Ellipta, Trelegy, Ellipta and others. The firm collaborates with and receives funding from GlaxoSmithKline.
